airhockeyjava.detection

Class Tracking

  • java.lang.Object
    • airhockeyjava.detection.Tracking
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class Tracking
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Accesses the computer's webcam and display the video feed in both RGB and HSV. Allows the HSV images to be filtered via sliders. After a reasonably sized object has been detected the centroid of it will be detected and marked on both videos.
    Author:
    Nima Akhbari
